channel.title: How do i make the jdk6 update 1 work
channel.description: ok someone please post what i need to put in my "path", "classpath", and my compiler!!!!!

item.title: How do i make the jdk6 update 1 work
item.dc:creator: @HyperCom HyperCom
item.description:
@HyperCom wrote:

Compiler input the following -

@echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Path input this -

C:Windows\System32\;"C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_01\bin

Classpath input this -

C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_01\bin

I belive thats the path for the JDK update? If this doesn’t work let me know and Ill fix it.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make the jdk6 update 1 work
